ygData.subject: Re: Lvl 16 blues (Plus Lvl 22 Blues)
ygData.msgSnippet: Though I may be wrong it sounds like you should start looking to adventure/purchase a lizard cloak out of lower gukk or the silver bracers which run somewhere
ygData.messageBody:
Though I may be wrong it sounds like you should start looking to
adventure/purchase a lizard cloak out of lower gukk or the silver bracers
which run somewhere in the 125pp range. Also you may want to look into
getting the Jagged rings not sure where they are, heard the dwarf ghost in
UNrest then not but they are ac5 and two of those I think would be better
then +10 agi but thats just a wild guess, I love AC!
